price: Wͻbisaa sε: “Abraham wo na woyεε yεn anyame no sei?”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
